actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to create a standing Committee on Small Business.

summary.text: Establishes a Committee on Small Business in the House of Representatives, to consist of nineteen members. States that the committee shall have jurisdiction over the following items: (1) assistance to and protection of small businesses, including financial aid; (2) participation of small-business enterprises in Federal procurement and Government contracts; and (3) studying and investigating, on a continuing basis, the problems of all types of small businesses.

titles.title: Resolution to create a standing Committee on Small Business.
